content: Water collector ring ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Drill stand mounted water collectors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Enables clean drilling overhead Collect up to 100% of slurry Applications Used when coring on walls or overhead to fit a water collector system to a drill stand Water collector systems can be used with the WMS 100 water management system or a vacuum cleaner ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Water collector holders Product information: Water collection system for handheld applications for DD 150-U For use with: DD 150-U Technical Data | Accessory type | Water collector holders | Product information | Water collection system for handheld applications for DD 150-U | For use with | DD 150-U | Additional Accessory Information | Water collection system for handheld applications for DD 150-U ### ITEMS- 2008130 - Water collector ring - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 150-U Water collector holder assy
